layer_sequence_is_paused: With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will check if the sequence is currently paused or not, returning true if it is paused, and false if it is not.
The unique ID value of the sequence element to target
The above code checks if the sequence element ID stored in the variable "title_sequence" is paused, and if it is it starts it playing.
